# The TypeOS Company

## About
The TypeOS Company - We're building a better way to learn with VibeLearn and VibeGrade.

## Products

### VibeLearn
The Future of Writing is Here. Work with AI directly in your Google Docs.
- Website: https://vibelearn.com/
- Join Waitlist: https://vibelearn.com/waitlist

### VibeGrade
AI-powered grading and assessment platform for educators.
- Website: https://vibegrade.com/

## Company Information
- Name: The TypeOS Company
- Location: San Francisco (SF)
- Website: https://typeoscompany.com
- Twitter/X: @typeoscompany (https://x.com/typeoscompany)

## Current Status
TypeOS Preview - Currently in development phase with products in beta/waitlist stage.

## Contact & Links
- Company Values: /values
- Careers: /careers
- Waitlist: https://vibelearn.com/waitlist
- Social Media: @typeoscompany on X/Twitter

## Description
The TypeOS Company is building innovative AI-powered tools for education and productivity, focusing on seamless integration with popular platforms like Google Docs to revolutionize how people write, learn, and collaborate.
